member.name: ID3D10EffectRenderTargetViewVariable.GetRenderTarget
member.param: The address of a pointer to a render-target-view interface. See .
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectRenderTargetViewVariable.GetRenderTargetArray
member.param: A pointer to an array of render-target-view interfaces. See .
The zero-based array index to get the first interface.
The number of elements in the array.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectRenderTargetViewVariable.SetRenderTarget
member.param: A pointer to a render-target-view interface. See .
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectRenderTargetViewVariable.SetRenderTargetArray
member.param: Set an array of render-target-view interfaces. See .
The zero-based array index to store the first interface.
The number of elements in the array.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectRenderTargetViewVariable
member.summary: A render-target-view interface accesses a render target.
